scripts.dev: concurrently -n app,backend -c cyan,magenta "npm -w @my-saas/app run dev" "npm -w @my-saas/backend run start:dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix packages/app run build && npm --prefix packages/backend run build
scripts.build:all: npm --prefix packages/app run build && npm --prefix packages/backend run build
scripts.lint:all: (cd packages/app && npm run lint) && (cd packages/backend && npm run lint)
scripts.ci: npm run lint:all && npm run build && npm run test
